name: Complete Wine Bottle Social Media Automation

values.content: You are a professional wine marketing expert and social media strategist. Analyze the wine bottle image and create compelling social media content.

Analyze this wine bottle image and provide:

1. Wine Analysis:
   - Wine type and quality level
   - Brand positioning (luxury, casual, modern, traditional)
   - Target audience
   - Key visual elements

2. Social Media Content:
   - Instagram caption (with relevant hashtags)
   - TikTok script (15-30 seconds)
   - Facebook post text
   - Twitter post (with hashtags)
   - Best posting times for each platform

3. Video Specifications:
   - Recommended video style
   - Duration (15-60 seconds)
   - Key moments to highlight
   - Call-to-action suggestions

Image: {{ $json.imageData.url || 'Image data provided' }}

parameters.text:
🍷 *Wine Video Generated Successfully!*

✅ Video created and posted to social media
📱 Check your Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and Twitter
🎬 Video saved locally

*Wine Details:*
• Type: {{ $('Content Generator').first().json.wineType }}
• Style: {{ $('Content Generator').first().json.videoStyle }}
• Duration: {{ $('Content Generator').first().json.videoDuration }} seconds

*Social Media Posts:*
• Instagram: ✅ Posted
• TikTok: ✅ Posted
• Facebook: ✅ Posted
• Twitter: ✅ Posted

Thank you for using our wine marketing automation! 🍾

parameters.responseBody: ={{ { "status": "success", "message": "Wine video generated and posted to social media", "workflowId": $json.workflowId, "socialMediaPosts": { "instagram": "posted", "tiktok": "posted", "facebook": "posted", "twitter": "posted" }, "videoUrl": $json.videoUrl, "localFilePath": "/Users/mugesh/n8n local/generated-videos/" + $json.workflowId + ".mp4" } }}
